alert.note: Alert for Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:48PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garland, western Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 147 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hot Springs Village, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Haskell... Lonsdale... Paron... Nance... Grape... Crows... Bland... Reform... Owensville... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 109 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
